description: an intelligent cybersecurity solution that uses machine learning to automatically detect, analyze, and alert potential threats in real time.

Project focuses on default prediction and financial analysis to assess a companys ability to meet its debt obligations. Using machine learning models, financial ratios, and feature importance analysis, the project identifies key drivers of default risk and builds a predictive framework to classify companies as likely to default or not.

A hybrid machine learning framework for river discharge forecasting that combines ensemble regression models with the Arithmetic Optimization Algorithm (AOA) for hyperparameter tuning and next-day flow prediction.
A generalised framework for property-driven machine learning, combining input region specification via hyper-rectangles with differentiable logics to compile logical constraints into loss.

This project develops machine learning models to predict key performance properties of carbon-ceramic composites, including thermal conductivity, mechanical strength, and oxidation resistance. By analyzing composition and processing parameters, we enable optimized material design and quality control for advanced ceramic manufacturing.

This repository showcases a machine learning pipeline for galaxy classification using data from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) Data Release 18 (DR18). It utilises XGBoost, a gradient boosting framework, to perform a binary classification task.
A high-throughput framework for automated harmonic and anharmonic phonon calculations using DFT and machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs).

Ce dpt GitHub offre des exercices varis couvrant l'analyse d'algorithmes, le deep learning, le machine learning, le NLP, et des frameworks tels que PyTorch, TensorFlow, et Spark. Des exercices sur les systmes de recommandations sont aussi disponibles.
Advanced Machine Learning Framework in Python, Rust & Go - A comprehensive ML library with scikit-learn-like API supporting classical ML and deep learning across three languages
This App uses ML.NET Machine Learning framework to rate sentiments based on Yelp Customer reviews dataset
This repository provides a comprehensive machine learning framework for predicting microbial activity based on AFLP (Amplified Fragment Length Polymorphism) data and API 50 CH test results.
Codes used on the paper: Binary classifiers for noisy datasets: a comparative study of existing quantum machine learning frameworks and some new approaches, 2021 https://arxiv.org/abs/2111.03372

This repository documents my learning journey in Full Stack Data Science with a focus on Generative AI and Agentic AI. It includes daily tasks, hands-on projects, and experiments using Python, machine learning, and modern AI frameworks. The work reflects both foundational concepts and advanced techniques applied in real-world scenarios.

Semi-supervised machine learning framework for datasets with limited labels, demonstrating applied AI/ML and data science skills in predictive modeling. Includes rigorous data preprocessing, selective pseudo-labeling, and a three-phase training workflow, achieving strong result of test F1 = 0.9986, surpassing published benchmarks
A Framework for Equitable and Responsible Machine Learning & Validation of AI
A comprehensive machine learning framework for dark sector physics analysis

NOVA is a tool for annotating and analyzing behaviours in social interactions. It supports Annotators using Machine Learning already during the coding process. Further it features both, discrete labels and continuous scores and a visuzalization of streams recorded with the SSI Framework.
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone
A comprehensive collection of practical machine learning examples using popular frameworks and libraries.

Aggressive ML Trading System is a machine learningdriven backtesting framework that fetches market data, trains predictive models, generates trading signals, executes trades with risk controls, and evaluates performance through detailed portfolio and risk-adjusted return metrics.
A unified framework for machine learning with time series

An advanced text classification system for categorizing news articles using multiple machine learning models. This project demonstrates modern NLP techniques with a comprehensive evaluation framework and interactive web interface.

Se profundiza en los fundamentos del aprendizaje automtico (Machine Learning), aprendizaje profundo (Deep Learning) y anlisis predictivo, capacitando a los estudiantes en el uso de bibliotecas y frameworks como TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn y Keras.
A non-intrusive cascading FFT-informed machine learning (FIML) framework for detecting both electrical and mechanical faults in squirrel-cage induction motors.
A framework for performing active learning for training machine-learned interatomic potentials.

This repository offers a fully automated, object-oriented machine learning framework that providing a scalable framework for efficient model training, evaluation, and logging. Supporting various classification algorithms and requiring minimal coding (97% coding-free), it allows users to manage the entire process via command-line arguments.
A framework to monitor and improve the performance of PostgreSQL using Machine Learning methods.

Traffic-DSTG-Gen is a flexible, open-source tool for generating dynamic, spatio-temporal graph datasets from traffic simulations. Designed to support advanced traffic prediction research, it converts vehicle and junction movements captured via traffic simulators into richly-structured graphs compatible with modern machine learning frameworks.

Machine learning-based analysis of precipitation-induced groundwater infiltration trends in an specific basin in Iran using historical hydrological data and CMIP6 climate projections. Includes evapotranspiration estimation (Thornthwaite), water balance analysis, and a novel bias-correcting framework for downscaling CMIP6 data..

This project investigates whether machine learning models can accurately predict student academic performance using demographic, social, and early academic indicators, developing a comprehensive framework that identifies at-risk students, reveals key performance factors, and enables targeted interventions before critical learning gaps develop.

AI Driven Semantic Framework for Advanced Cyber Threat Analysis and Sharing using comprehensive machine learning and deep learning framework for real-time cyber threat detection, analysis, and intelligence sharing.

This is an intelligent system to optimize food redistribution, reducing waste and improving delivery efficiency using machine learning and optimization algorithms. It classifies food, predicts demand, and plans logistics through simulations in Python-based frameworks. Visualization and dashboards enable monitoring, analysis, and scalable,  testing.

End-to-end machine learning framework for network intrusion detection using behavioural analysis. Implements Random Forest to detect malicious traffic, addressing signature-based limitations. Covers full data lifecycle: large-scale handling, model training, validation, and real-time prototype deployment.

This project provides a comprehensive framework for satellite anomaly detection using machine learning. The goal is to develop and evaluate various models to automatically identify unusual patterns in satellite telemetry data, enabling early detection of potential malfunctions and enhancing the reliability of space-based assets.

This repository implements a Machine Translation system using a Sequence-to-Sequence (Seq2Seq) architecture with attention mechanism for translating English sentences to Hindi. Built using deep learning frameworks, the project includes data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and inference scripts.
Machine learning framework for Rotor Bearing Remaining Useful Life prediction
An opinionated machine learning framework.

CryptoMarket Regime Classifier is a machine learning framework that detects market regimes (Trend, Range, Squeeze, etc.) in crypto markets using multi-timeframe data and Hidden Markov Models. The project provides plug-and-play labeled datasets and trained models (HMM + LSTM) for downstream strategy development, position sizing, and risk management.
A series of hands-on projects and code examples for building machine learning applications using industry-standard frameworks.

Our project is on "Machine Learning Based Risk Scoring" for the course Cyber Security Mangament. The baselines paper we are using is "Redefining GRC in the Digital Age: Integrating AI-Driven Risk Management Frameworks. Group 18 Members: Muhammad Alishan Mirza and Jevaan Dhamala

SimTradeML is a modular, cloud-ready framework for training, evaluating, and deploying machine learning models in financial simulation environments. It serves as the predictive engine behind the SimTrade ecosystem, bridging raw data from SimTradeData and strategy logic in SimTradeLab.

MLX, PyTorch & Hugging Face Demo on MacBook Pro M4 Pro: A comprehensive demonstration showcasing Apple Silicon's machine learning capabilities through three frameworks - MLX for native optimization, PyTorch with MPS for GPU acceleration, and Hugging Face for pre-trained models. Leverages unified memory architecture.

This project combines machine learning with blockchain to build a secure credit card fraud detection framework. ML algorithms detect fraudulent transactions, while blockchain provides decentralized trust and immutable records, ensuring reliable, real-time financial protection.

This project presents a novel machine learning framework for predicting wine quality by combining textual wine descriptions with structured features. We trained baseline and fusion models (Ridge, XGBoost) and deployed them in an interactive Gradio dashboard that visualizes predictions with score gauges and radar charts.

Banks face frequent loan defaults, demanding robust risk management. This study builds a machine learning framework to predict credit defaults using structured financial data. It includes data preprocessing, model building, and fairness evaluation to ensure predictions are both accurate and socially equitable.
Automatic quantification and classification of geometric distortion in prostate diffusion-weighted MRI using an ensemble machine learning framework.
Pseudo real-time framework for GDP nowcasting in Thailand using machine learning, with a focus on accuracy and interpretability.
Naive bayes machine learning model, trained to filter spam messages. Simple approach made without any external framework. Using only hands and numpy. WITHOUT sklearn
A Rust machine learning framework.

Machine Learning-based framework for predicting high-turbidity events in reservoirs using Sentinel-2 satellite imagery, meteorological data, and USGS in-situ observations. Includes data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and performance evaluation for real-time water quality monitoring applications.

Automated multi-engine framework for unpacking, analyzing, and devirtualizing binaries protected by commercial and custom Virtual Machine based protectors. Combines Dynamic Taint Tracking, Symbolic Execution, Pattern & Semantic Classification, and Machine Learningdriven prioritization to dramatically reduce manual reverse engineering time.

gCoSRNA, a generalizable machine learning framework for predicting coaxial stacking in RNA junctions using only sequence and secondary structure information.

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.

Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Machine Learning as a Service (MLaaS) supports intelligent IoT applications but faces performance drift due to dynamic data and provider updates. We propose an MLaaS Performance Drift Detection (MPDD) framework with an adaptive mechanism (APDDM) that balances sensitivity, improving accuracy by 1520% and reducing missed detections by 15%.

brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

It was to implement stock price forecasting using both  traditional statistical and machine learning methods and evaluate their performance  under a rolling window evaluation framework.
